fields.label: date
fields.description: The date of the incident in YYYY-MM-DD format.

fields.label: year
fields.description: The year of the incident in YYYY format.

fields.label: time
fields.description: The 24-hour time of the incident, in HH:MM format.

fields.label: address
fields.description: The street address of the incident (uppercased).

fields.label: state
fields.description: The two-letter code for the state in which the incident occurred.

fields.label: city
fields.description: The name of the city in which the incident occured.

fields.label: latitude
fields.description: The latitudinal position of the incident.

fields.label: longitude
fields.description: The longitudinal position of the incident.

fields.label: service_type
fields.description: The reason the officer(s) reported to the scene.

fields.label: force_type
fields.description: The type of force used.

fields.label: reason
fields.description: The reason for using force.

fields.label: light_conditions
fields.description: The level of available light during the incident.

fields.label: weather_conditions
fields.description: The weather during the incident

fields.label: officer_sex
fields.description: The sex of the involved officer.

fields.label: officer_race
fields.description: The race of the involved officer.

fields.label: officer_age
fields.description: The age of the involved officer.

fields.label: officer_injuries
fields.description: A summary of injuries to the involved officer.

fields.label: officer_injured
fields.description: A boolean value indicating if the involved officer was injured.

fields.label: officer_hospitalized
fields.description: A boolean value indicating if the involved officer was hospitalized.

fields.label: hire_date
fields.description: The hire date of the involved officer, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

fields.label: experience
fields.description: The number of years worked by the involved officer.

fields.label: subject_sex
fields.description: The sex of the involved subject.

fields.label: subject_dob
fields.description: The date of birth of the involved subject, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

fields.label: subject_race
fields.description: The race of the involved subject.

fields.label: subject_ethnicity
fields.description: The ethnicity of the involved subject.

fields.label: aggravating_factors
fields.description: A summary of aggravating factors

fields.label: subject_injuries
fields.description: A summary of injuries to the involved subject.

fields.label: subject_injured
fields.description: A boolean value indicating if the involved subject was injured.

fields.label: subject_armed
fields.description: A boolean value indicating if the involved subject was armed.

fields.label: subject_hospitalized
fields.description: A boolean value indicating if the involved subject was hospitalized.

fields.label: subject_age
fields.description: The age of the involved subject.

fields.label: resistance_type
fields.description: The type of resistance by the involved subject.

fields.label: arrested
fields.description: A boolean value indicating if the involved subject was arrested.

fields.label: charge
fields.description: A description of the charges assigned to the involved subject.

fields.label: officer_id
fields.description: A description of the charges assigned to the involved subject.
fields.example: A unique identification number assigned to individual officers.

fields.label: disposition
fields.description: The final outcome of any arrests or prosecutions related to the event.

fields.label: case_number
fields.description: A unique identification number assigned to the particular incident.

fields.label: beat
fields.description: An integer representing the officer's patrol territory and time.

fields.label: sector
fields.description: An integer representing the sector (or "neighborhood") of the incident.

fields.label: division
fields.description: The division (or "station") that the incident occured in.

fields.label: district
fields.description: The district that the incident occured in.
